**City Offices will be closed February 16, 2026, in observance of President's Day.**

If your appearance or court date falls on a Friday, Saturday, Sunday, City Holiday, or day that offices are closed due to inclement weather, your appearance or court date will automatically default to the next regular business day.

* You have the right to plead "not guilty" and appear at a trial by judge or a trial by jury with a required $200.00 Appearance Bond filed with the court.
* If you are financially unable to pay a fine/costs, you have alternative options, including requesting a 30-day extension, requesting a payment plan, or, in certain circumstances, requesting community service.

###### **Credit card payments by phone: 1-866-549-1010**

![](https://nebula.wsimg.com/8ae57ad8073130f442d9144a1b059e51?AccessKeyId=E76D055F4D43584A160C&disposition=0&alloworigin=1)


Cisco Municipal Court is open between the hours of 8:00 a.m. and 5:00 p.m., Monday through Thursday.
**Fridays,
, by appointment
.**

​
**Phones will
be answered on Fridays.**



–   If you are financially unable to pay, other options such as payment plans and/or  community service are available. You MUST contact the court for approval of alternative options  .If you are unable to pay and unable to complete alternative options, the Court will hear sworn testimony and evidence concerning your financial situation to help resolve this matter. In severe instances, the judge can reduce or dismiss fines and court costs upon hearing sworn testimony, depending on the severity of your financial status..

**MAKE A CREDIT CARD PAYMENT.  YOU MUST CONTACT THE COURT TO ENSURE THAT YOU HAVE ALL THE INFORMATION NECESSARY, INCLUDING POTENTIAL DISMISSAL OPTIONS AND CITATION BALANCES.**

* ​
  **You must contact the Court for permission before paying Deferral, Defensive Driving, or making partial payments.**

* ​Payment will not be processed until the next business day. If there is a warrant for your arrest, it will not be recalled until the day the payment is posted.
